Bullet raised his open right hand and slapped Chameleon in a backhand motio=
n. knocking the smaller bot away.

Blaze started to grab Bullet but thought=
 it better not to. She just stepped back to enjoy the show.

Bullet let out=
 a bullish snort. he was quickly losing his temper. He transformed to his b=
ig brown bull mode and rushed at Chameleon. If the bot didn't move quickly =
it would be gored through by Bullets horns.
  ----- Original Message ----- =

  From: Airshadow Nightlight

day, March 21, 2001 9:53 PM
  Subject: Chamaleon/ALARM IN BLACKFORTRESS


 =
 Chameleon::

  "Thanks for the advice..." repleid the male "I don't mind d=
eal with his patiente... I have enough dealing with several insane bots her=
e..."

  Chameleon used his large tongue to hit a big red button that was l=
ocated in the oposite wall while with a hand he pushed a button that turned=
 off the lights... Alarms in all BlackFortresss started rang, letting to ot=
hers where they were (Quarters' area); Also Chamelon knew that close where =
they where was Thyphon's quarters... and Thyphon was a bad humor when someo=
ne interrump his nap...
